author: tpena
title: Infrastructure & Blockchain
description:
Corruption impeding development. Using blockchain as a fool proof process in development. 
The aim is to decentralize using blockchain.
solution: Create a protocol using blockchain that can be used to plan, develop, and close-out projects at the local level.
experience: 18 yrs. Engineering, 2yrs. plus capital planning & asset management and 10 yrs. program management.
